item.title: September 24, 2022
item.description:
Another big update!
- (General) Minified CSS and JS files
- (General) Adjusted all files to use new CSS and JS files
- (Art) Finished 2016 section, and optimized code
- (About) Created a dream diary
- (About) Added more fanlistings
- (About) Updated profile and quizzes
- (About) Added a FAQ page and added links to appropriate pages
- (Links) Added more links, joined another webring
- (Web goods) Added more graphics, a toy box, and a blinkie section

item.title: September 19, 2022
item.description:
A pretty big update this time around!
- (General) Moved several pages around
- (General) Rearranged sections

- (About) Added a quiz result
- (About) Added awards
- (Art) Added a new Misc. art section

item.title: September 15, 2022
item.description: - Moved the stamps to a separate page in the "Web Goodies" section, and added a new pot to the Webgarden! Also adjusted the site to use a minified version of the CSS.

item.title: September 13, 2022
item.description: Added a new blog post and updated the links page to allow users to play or stop GIFs. I also made some new stamps! They can be found in the Graphics page.

item.title: August 26, 2022
item.description: Minor changes, but all images in the Graphics page have a neat function where you can play or stop the GIFs! Hopefully, this will be helpful to those who are sensitive to flashing/moving images.

item.description: Added a new blog entry. It's another tutorial of sorts. :3

item.description: Created a new section for web goods and the webgarden! The garden is pretty big, so expect loading times to be a little bit longer. ^_^;
